body.name: Eureka Cordless Vacuum Cleaner for Home, Stick Vacuum Cordless Rechargeable Detachable Battery, Rapid Clean Ultra Powerful Suction LED Display, 40min Runtime, NEC370GR, Green
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 23 hrs 14 mins
features: Lightweight yet Powerful: Cordless handheld vacuum only weighs 5.5lbs, easy to lift up for above-floor cleaning needs. 300W motor offers powerful suction for daily messes and high-traffic areas.
Up to 40 Minutes of Runtime: detachable battery provides up to 40 minutes of long-lasting operation at a single full charge.
Efficient 5-Stage Cyclone Filtration System: Innovative cyclone filtration system with a HEPA filter to help separate and capture even the smallest particles of dust.
Smart LED Display & Smooth Speed Control: Smart Design shows real-time battery level and this cordless vacuum switches between 3 modes at your fingertip control.
Under Furniture & Swivel Steering: low profile design and 180°rotatable floor brush makes it easy to maneuver and clean under furniture.

Convenient Accessory Attachments : equipped with upgraded nozzle and crevice tool, with a 2-in-1 furniture brush you can easily complete your daily cleaning needs on multiple surface: hard floor, carpet, pet hair etc.
body.description: We know you value a clean home and Eureka is proud to offer whole home cleaning solutions to make life a little easier. EREUKA RapidClean Ultra Cordless Vacuum Cleaner is your ultimate solution for daily effortless deep cleaning! Lightweight design makes it easy to maneuver and carry around for above-floor cleaning for home. Great performance detachable and rechargeable battery provides up to 40mins runtime at a single charge, convenient for continuous cleaning. Upgraded motor provides super powerful suction for daily messes and high-traffic areas. Innovative cyclone filtration system and HEPA filter separate and capture even the smallest particles of dust, giving back fresh air. Plus, equipped upgraded nozzle, crevice too & 2-in-1 furniture brush are convenient on multi-surface: hard floor, carpet, pet hair etc. HEPA filter can be rinsed and dried for next use, without any maintenance cost. Don't miss out on this amazing cordless vacuum cleaner for home. Get the EUREKA NEC370GR Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner today for a cleaner, fresher home with ease.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LED Smart Display An upgraded LED smart display shows the suction mode and battery level in real-time. This cordless vacuum switches easily between 3 modes at your fingertip control. Detachable Battery The detachable battery provides up to 40 minutes of long-lasting operation at a single full charge. Purchase an extra battery pack to extend runtime. Runtime:Low gear 40mins, medium gear 25mins, high gear 10mins. Under-Furniture Reach The low profile design and 180°rotatable motorized floor nozzle makes it easy to maneuver this cordless vacuum to clean under furniture.

Easy Empty Dust Cup Simply press the Dust Cup Empty Button, the cup will open easily to empty without touching the dirt and dust particles. Efficient 5-Stage Filtration System Innovative 5-stage cyclone filtration system provides max filtration efficiency, helping separate and capture even the smallest particles of dust. Easy Maintenance The HEPA filter can be rinsed and dried for reusability, making maintenance easy, economic and cost effective. *Suggest replacing the HEPA filter every 3 months FAQ- Where to purchase a replacement for the Filter Accessory Kit or the Battery Pack+ Adaptor ? Filter Accessory Kit: Directly search for B0CNRBDSY3 Battery Pack1+ Adaptor 1: Directly search for B0CNWYR9LQ

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little vacuum!
reviews.reviewText: So light! At full power, it does just fine with carpet. Exactly what I need it to do. Picks up my cats fluff, and leaves lovely vacuum lines in my carpet. The battery gets drained real quick on full power, but it's enough to thoroughly clean one level of my home, or quickly sweep up the main floor and upstairs. If I ran it at mid power, I could probably clean my whole house at once, if I was feeling ambitious. It's easy to take apart and clean, and the filter does a great job of keeping dust in. I got it mostly for cleaning my stairs, and as a bonus car vacuum. Instead, I've found myself using it nearly everyday. Just love it. I hope the battery and filter replacement aren't too expensive or hard to find.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this cordless vacuum and I am so pleased with my purchase. It’s very light weight and very easy to put together. I can vacuum all over my house without cords and cleans my entire house without need for recharging. I love how easy it is to clean !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have to say I am definitely happy with this purchase. I hated having to pull the vacuum out everyday due to my GSD and the hair. This little vacuum is so easy to hook up, maneuver and store. The clean up is simple and allows you to keep it clean. The ONLY downfall I see is the battery, if you run it on the highest speed you lose battery life quickly, better to run it on 2nd speed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Battery life not great
reviews.reviewText: Cool design, lightweight and easy to use, good features, battery life not great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for the price
reviews.reviewText: Vacuum is very nice to use because it's not wired to an outlet. That being said the battery does last for 40+ minutes and the suction is good just don't expect a Dyson.This vacuum makes it much easier and faster to use vs having to lug out a similar sized vacuum that has to be plugged in to use.Regardless I would recommend this to anyone who likes portability and ease of use.It's been a great product to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Great vacuum but zero spare parts available.
reviews.reviewText: First off, this is really a great vacuum! Easy to use and clean. It's light weight and very maneuverable.Why did I rate it one star if it's so great?NO SPARE PARTS ARE AVAILABLE ANYWHERE!!!I contacted Eureka directly about obtaining an extra battery, an extra HEPA filter, and an extra cotton filter. I have all of these part numbers from the owner's manual. After several back-and-forth e-mails with Eureka, I was told that this model, NEC370GN, was too new of a model and no parts are available.Say what? What company sells a product such as this with ZERO support? Eureka!!!I was told that if I needed parts that I should contact a company called Encompass. I'm familiar with this company and have purchased from them in the past. Ok, I get on their website and send them a message telling them what I have and what I need. I supplied all the numbers that they need to ID the vac and the parts.Encompass tells me via e-mail that they need more info to 'research' the product. They need me to send a pic of the tag that includes the model number and the serial number. Huh? I gave them all those numbers along with the part numbers that I need. Do they not believe me? Do they not think that I gave them the right numbers?What a pain. Had I known this I wouldn't have purchased a Eureka vac at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this vacuum cleaner's suction power. It works well on both hardwood floors and carpets. Also, pick up cat litter and pet fur easily. Very lightweight and the perfect size. And I like the on /off button is separated from the power level button. And the LED light on the front. Easy to see the tiny dust on the floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Weak as water. Over priced for what it amounts to.
reviews.reviewText: Built well enough for light home use. Weak suction. Nice design, but not strong suction or super sturdy in my opinion. Very light. I would not recommend if you have pets, the hair will stop this vacuum easy.
